page.title: 05A Day in the Life of Ruth
page.content: Saturday morning 9.15 a.m. I wake up to the screams of my brother.I get out of bed lazily and walk to the bathroom half asleep.Once I've had a wash and cleaned my teeth,I walk back into my bedroom slightly more awake,and get dressed.My mum shouts up to me"Hurry up,we are going to town".I comb my hair and quickly make my bed.I open my curtains and run downstairs.It is now about 9.45 a.m.I quickly eat my cornflakes and wash up.I run to get my coat and shoes to go to Warrington.At 10.15 a.m. my mum and I go in the car to town. After rushing around the shops we go to a quiet cafe for a cup of tea.At about 11.30 a.m. we return to the car and drive to Hood Manor and buy a few things from the shops there.At 12.20 a.m. we arrive home shattered.
